title: Task 1 Letter - Correct Verb Forms
content: Complete the Task 1 letter below by using the correct form of the word in brackets. Type your answers in the spaces provided.

questions.instructions: Complete the letter by filling in each blank with the correct form of the verb given in brackets.
questions.question:
Dear Mr and Mrs Haynes.

I (WRITE) [field 1] to you about the letter you sent recently about the problems our dog is creating because he keeps (MANAGE) [field 2] to get into your premises.

I am so sorry about this situation and I really hope that he (NOT / CAUSE) [field 3] too much damage to your beautiful plants and lawn as I know you spend a great deal of time making your garden look so lovely.

We (DISCOVER) [field 4] that he (ABLE) [field 5] to get out because of a hole in the back of the fence. We (INTEND) [field 6] to fix it this weekend when we are not working.

In the meantime, we (MAKE) [field 7] sure he stays in the house or only goes into the garden while on a lead.

Can you please let me know if he has completely ruined any of your plants? If he has, we would be more than happy (BUY) [field 8] some replacements from the garden centre.

Once again, I (APOLOGISE) [field 9] for what has happened and will make sure it (NOT / OCCUR) [field 10] again.

Best wishes
John Morris
